name: Children of Tyr
description:
The brief was Seize The Day/ Carpe Diem, so we thought... hmm.. how do we make this Viking? Then we had the idea of setting the game after Ragnarok, Surtr's sword has pierced Asgard and Fenrir has devoured the sun. As the player you have to collect pieces of the Sun scattered around the level to bring back the day. Quite literally, seizing the day. You will face enemies that spawn from the remnants of the sun. ---Controls--- Move = WASD

Jump = Space Bar

Attack = Left Mouse Button

---Team--- Byron Dula: Character creation, Blueprinting and Fx

www.artstation.com/crimsondesign

Dan Jones: Programming, Blueprinting, UI and Materials

https://www.linkedin.com/in/danjones0123/

Alice Hughes: 3D Environment, 2D Textures and Assets, Lighting and UI

www.artstation.com/catkitsu

Stephen Cowling: Character and Enemy Animation

www.artstation.com/4ste

Jake Gaules: Sound Design

www.submergedtapes.com
